name: Trauma (itch) (Work in Progress)
description:
TRAUMA

ˈtrɔːmə,ˈtraʊmə/

noun

  1. a deeply distressing or disturbing experience. 

         "a personal trauma like the death of a child"

Trauma is a 2D puzzle platformer in which we delve deep into the traumatized mind of our protagonist. Can you uncover what happened on that fateful May Day night? 

The game features ground-breaking mechanics, in which you have to kill yourself and use your bodies as tools. You also become a ghost when you die and you can reach new places, possess bodies and find new solutions to the mind boggling puzzles. Light also plays a big role in the game, hiding secrets and preventing the ghost from passing on. 

Trauma placed fourth in the Assembly GameDevCombo 2017
